page.title: 11BOXTED ROSE FESTIVAL
page.content: A Rose Festival was held at St.peter's Church on 29th-30th June in order to raise money for the roof and heating fund.Strawberry teas were served and there were stalls sellingcakes,plants and vegetable.There was a Grand Draw, 1st prize-Â£100 note,2nd-Â£50 note, 3rd-Â£25 note. The organ was played during the week-end by Mrs.E.Packard, Mrs.E.Schofield, Mrs.E.Lancashire. The floral arrangements placed round the church were representatives of organisations in the Parish_amongst them the Parish Council,the P.C.C., Village Hall Management Committee, N.S.P.C.C.,R.S.P.C.A.,Royal British Legion,Women's Institute,Primary School,the Parish Church,Methodist Church and Youth Club,Playgroup, Brownies,Evergreen Club and many private individuals.
